hero.subtitle: Leading provider of hardware solutions, maintenance services, and specialized technology for corporate excellence
hero.card1.title: Enterprise Hardware
hero.card1.body: High-performance computing solutions tailored for demanding business environments
hero.card2.title: Maintenance & Support
hero.card2.body: Comprehensive maintenance services ensuring maximum uptime and reliability
hero.card3.title: Specialized Solutions
hero.card3.body: Industry-specific hardware including rugged systems and banking solutions

about.title: Who We Are
about.intro: TRANS-LOG is a premier technology solutions provider, specializing in enterprise hardware procurement, maintenance, and cutting-edge computing solutions for businesses across industries.
about.mission.title: Our Mission
about.mission.body: To deliver innovative hardware solutions and exceptional service that empower businesses to achieve their technological goals
about.expertise.title: Our Expertise
about.expertise.body: Decades of combined experience in enterprise technology, from high-end computing to specialized industry solutions
about.commitment.title: Our Commitment
about.commitment.body: Building lasting partnerships through reliable service, quality products, and comprehensive support
about.why.title: Why Choose TRANS-LOG?
about.why.p1: We understand that technology is the backbone of modern business. That's why we go beyond simply providing hardware—we deliver complete solutions backed by expert planning, procurement, and ongoing support.
about.why.p2: From CAD workstations for design teams to rugged hardware for extreme environments, from banking solutions to enterprise computing—we have the expertise and partnerships to meet your unique needs.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive technology solutions designed to keep your business running at peak performance
services.procurement.title: Hardware Procurement & Planning
services.procurement.body: Strategic hardware acquisition and deployment planning tailored to your business needs and budget. We handle everything from needs assessment to installation and configuration.
services.maintenance.title: Corporate Hardware Maintenance
services.maintenance.body: Proactive maintenance and rapid support services to ensure your critical hardware infrastructure operates flawlessly with minimal downtime.
services.agreements.title: Tailored Service Agreements
services.agreements.body: We offer flexible service level agreements (SLAs) designed to match your specific requirements, ensuring the right level of support for your operations.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Premium hardware solutions across computing, rugged systems, and banking technology
products.computing.title: Computing Hardware
products.computing.body: Enterprise-grade computing solutions designed for performance, reliability, and scalability
products.computing.cards.1.title: High-End Computing Solutions
products.computing.cards.1.body: Powerful workstations and servers for demanding enterprise applications, data processing, and mission-critical operations
products.computing.cards.2.title: CAD Workstations
products.computing.cards.2.body: Specialized workstations optimized for CAD, 3D modeling, rendering, and engineering applications with professional-grade graphics
products.computing.cards.3.title: Accessories
products.computing.cards.3.body: Comprehensive range of peripherals, displays, networking equipment, and accessories to complete your technology infrastructure
products.rugged.title: Rugged Hardware
products.rugged.body: Military-grade, rugged computing solutions built to withstand extreme environments and harsh conditions
products.rugged.section.title: Industrial-Grade Rugged Solutions
products.rugged.section.body: Industrial-grade rugged computers, tablets, and mobile devices designed for field operations, military applications, manufacturing environments, and extreme outdoor conditions. Built to military standards (MIL-STD-810G) with IP67/IP68 ratings.
products.rugged.points.1: Rugged tablets and laptops for field operations
products.rugged.points.3: Mobile devices for extreme weather conditions
products.banking.title: Banking Solutions
products.banking.body: Secure, reliable hardware solutions specifically designed for banking and financial institutions
products.banking.section.title: Comprehensive Banking Hardware
products.banking.section.body: Complete range of banking hardware including ATMs, cash recyclers, teller automation systems, bill validators, payment terminals, and self-service kiosks. Advanced security features with full regulatory compliance for modern financial operations.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to transform your business with the right technology? Contact us today to discuss your needs
contact.lead.title: Let's Start a Conversation
contact.lead.body: Whether you need enterprise computing solutions, specialized hardware, or maintenance services, our team is ready to help you find the perfect solution for your business.
contact.form.title: Send Us a Message
contact.form.name: Full Name *
contact.form.message.placeholder: Tell us about your project or requirements...
contact.form.success: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you soon.
contact.form.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

footer.intro1: Your trusted partner for enterprise hardware solutions, maintenance services, and specialized technology systems.
footer.intro2: Empowering businesses through innovative technology solutions.
